wire [31:0] sum_out;
    wire [31:0] sub_out;
    wire [31:0] and_out;
    wire [31:0] or_out;

    // Instantiate the addition module
    adder sub;
    Subtractor sub;
    AndOperation and_op;
    OrOperation or_op;

    // Instantiate the addition module
    assign sum_out = sub_out;
    assign sub_out = and_out;
    assign and_out = or_out;

    // Instantiate the AND module
    assign and_out = and_out;

    // Instantiate the OR module
    assign or_out = or_out;

    // Instantiate the main output
    assign result = (op_sel == 0) ? sum_out :
                (op_sel == 1) ? sub_out :
                (op_sel == 2) ? and_out :
                32'b0;

endmodule

// Adder module
module Adder(
    input [31:0] a,
    input [31:0] b,
    output [31:0] sum
);
    assign sum = a + b;
endmodule

// Subtractor module
module Subtractor(
    input [31:0] a,
    input [31:0] b,
    output [31:0] sub
);
    assign sub = a - b;
endmodule

// AND module
module And(
    input [31:0] a,
    input [31:0] b,
    output [31:0] and
);
    assign and = a & b;
endmodule

// OR module
module Or(
    input [31:0] a,
    input [31:0] b,
    output [31:0] or
);
    assign or = a | b;
endmodule

    input [31:0] a,

    output [31:0] and
);

// OR module
module Or(
    input [31:0] a,
    input [31:0] b,
    output [31:0] or
);
    assign or = a | b;
endmodule

// Bitwise AND operation module
module And(
    input [31:0] a,
    input [31:0] b,
    output [31:0] and
);
    assign and = a & b;
endmodule

// Bitwise OR module
module Or(
    input [31:0] a,
    input [31:0] b,
    output [31:0] or
);
    assign or = a | b;
endmodule

// Bitwise XN module
module Xor(
    input [31:0] a,
    input [31:0] b,
    output [31:0] xnor
);
    assign xnor = ~(a | b);
endmodule

// Intermediate wires for addition and bitwise AND operation
wire [31:0] add_result;
wire [31:0] and_result;

// Addition submodule
bitwise_adder u_adder (
    .a(a),
    .b(b),
    .result(add_result)
);

// Bitwise AND submodule
bitwise_and u_and (
    .a(a),
    .b(b),
    .result(and_result)
);

// Main module
always @(*)
proc_alu(
    .clk(clk),
    .op_sel(op_sel),
    .a(a),
    .b(b),
    .result(result)
);

endmodule

// Addition submodule
module bitwise_adder(
    .a(a),
    .b(b),
    .result(result)
);

// Bitwise AND submodule
module bitwise_and(
    .a(a),
    .b(b),
    .result(result)
);

// Main module

pw_m_25 pwm_module_25 (
        .CLK_in(CLK_in),
        .RST(RST),
        .PWM(PWM_25)
    );
    pwm_module_50 pwm_module_50 (
        .CLK_in(CLK_in),
        .RST(RST),
        .PWM(PWM_50)
    );
    pwm_module_75 pwm_module_75 (
        .CLK_in(CLK_in),
        .RST(RST),
        .PWM(PWM_75)
    );
endmodule

module pwm_module_25 (
    input CLK_in,
    input RST,
    output PWM
);
    reg [24] counter;
    always @(*) begin
        if (RST) begin
            PWM <= 0;
        end else begin
            PWM <= 1;
        end
    end
endmodule

module pwm_module_50 (
    input CLK_in,
    input RST,
    output PWM
);
    reg [24] counter @(*) begin
        if (RST) begin
            PWM <= 0;
        end else begin
            PWM <= 1;
        end
    end
endmodule

module pwm_module_75 (
    input CLK_in,
    input RST,
    output PWM
);
    reg [24] counter @(*) begin
        if (RST) begin
            PWM <= 0;
        end else begin
            PWM <= 1;
        end
    end
endmodule

module pwm_duty_25 (
    input CLK_in,
    input RST,
    output reg PWM_25,
    output reg PWM_50,
    output reg PWM_75
);

    always @(posedge) begin
        if (RST) begin
            PWM_25 <= 0;
            PWM_50 <= 0;
            PWM_75 <= 0;
        end else begin
            PWM_25 <= 1;
            PWM_50 <= 1;
            PWM_75 <= 1;
        end
    end

    always @(*) begin
        if (RST) begin
            PWM_25 <= 0;
            PWM_50 <= 0;
            PWM_75 <= 0;
        end else begin
            PWM_25 <= 1;
            PWM_50 <= 1;
            PWM_75 <= 1;
        end
    end

endmodule

input [7:0] temp_sensor [7:0];
    input smoke_sensor [0];
    output alarm_out;

    wire compare_temp;
    wire smoke_detected;

    // Instantiate the temperature comparer module
    compare_temp compare_temp (
        .temp_input [7:0] temp_input,
        .threshold [7:0] threshold,
        .compare_output compare_output
    );

    // Instantiate the smoke detector module
    smoic_logic smoke_detector (
        .smoke_input smoke_input,
        .smoke_output smoke_detected
    );

    // Instantiate the alarm output
    assign alarm_out = compare_output & smoke_detected;

endmodule

module fetch_stage (
  input clk,
  input rst,
  input [31:0] instr_mem [31:0],
  input [31:0] reg_file [31:0]
  output reg_file [31:0]
);

  always @(posedge clk or posedge rst) begin
    if (rst) begin
      reg_file <= reg_file;
    end else begin
      reg_file <= instr_mem;
    end
  end

endmodule

module dec_stage (
  input clk,
  input rst,
  input [31:0] rs1,
  input rd,
  input op,
  output reg res
);

  always @(posedge clk or posedge rst) begin
    if (rst) begin
      res <= reg_file[rs1];
    end else begin
      res <= reg_file[rs1];
    end
  end

endmodule

module execute_stage (
  input clk,
  input rst,
  input [31:0] rs1,
  input rd,
  input op,
  output reg res
);

  always @(posedge clk or posedge rst) begin
    if (rst) begin
      res <= reg_file[rs1];
    end else begin
      res <= reg_file[rs1];
    end
  end

endmodule

module write_stage (
  input clk,

  input rd,

);

module fetch_stage (
  input clk,
  input rst,
  input [31:0] instr_mem [31:0],
  input [31:0] reg_file [31:0]
  output reg_file [31:0] res_reg_file [31:0]
);

  always @(posedge clk or posedge rst) begin
    if (rst) begin
      reg_file[31:0] <= instr_mem[31:0];
    end else begin
      reg_file[31:0] <= reg_file[31:0];
    end
  end

  always @(posedge clk or pos edge rst) begin
    if (rst) begin
      reg_file[31:0] <= instr_mem[31:0];
    end else begin
      reg_file[31:0] <= instr_mem[31:0];
    end
  end

endmodule

module dec_stage (
  input [31:0] rs1,
  input [31:0] rs2,
  input  rd,
  input  op,
  output reg_file [31:0] res
);

  always @(posedge clk or pos edge rst) begin
    if (op == 0) begin
      reg_file[31:0] <= rs1;
    end else begin
      reg_file[31:0] <= rs2;
    end
  end

  always @(pos edge clk or pos edge rst) begin
    if (rst) begin
      reg_file[31:0] <= rs1;
    end else begin
      reg_file[31:0] <= rs2;
    end
  end

endmodule

module execute_stage (
  input [31:0] rs1,
  input [31:0] rs2,
  input  rd,
  input  op,
  output reg_file [31:0] res
);

  always @(pos edge clk or pos edge rst) begin
    if (op == 0) begin
    reg_file[31:0] <= rs1;
    end else begin
    reg_file[31:0] <= rs2;
    end
  end

endmodule

    fetch_module fetch_stage (
        .clk(clk),
        .rst(rst),
        .instr_mem(instr_mem),
        .reg_file(reg_file),
        .reg_file_data(reg_file_data)
    );

    // Instantiate the execute stage
    execute_module execute_module (
        .clk(clk),
        .rst(rst),
        .reg_file_data(reg_file_data),
        .reg_file_data(reg_file_data)
    );

    // Instantiate the write stage
    write_module write_module (

        .rst(rst),
        .reg_file_data(reg_file_data),

module fetch_module (
    input clk,
    input rst,
    input [31:0] instr_mem [0:31],
    input [31:0] reg_file [0:31],
    output reg_file_data
);

    // Instantiate the fetch operation
    always @(posedge clk or posedge rst) begin
        if (rst) begin
            reg_file_data <= reg_file_data;
        end else begin
            reg_file_data <= reg_file_data;
        end
    end

endmodule

module execute_module (
    input clk,
    input rst,
    input [31:0] reg_file_data [31:0],
    output reg_file_data [31:0] reg_file_data [31:0]
);

    // Instantiate the write operation
    write_module write_module (
        .clk(clk),
        .rst(rst),
        .reg_file_data(reg_file_data),
        .reg_file_data(reg_file_data)
    );

endmodule

module write_module (
    input clk,
    input rst,
    input [31:0] reg_file_data [31:0],
    output reg_file_data [31:0]
);

    // Instantiate the write operation
    write_module write_module (
        .clk(clk),
        .rst(rst),
        .reg_file_data(reg_file_data),
        .reg_file_data(reg_file_data)
    );

endmodule

reg [9:0] data_accum;
    reg [9:0] data_temp;

    // Counter module
    counter counter(clk, rst_n, data_in, data_accum);

    // Data Accumulator module
    data_accumulator data_accumulator(data_in, data_accum);

    // Valid Output module
    valid_output valid_output(valid_out, data_out);

endmodule

// Counter module
module counter(
    input clk,
    input rst_n,
    input [7:0] data_in,
    output reg [9:0] data_accum
);

    always @(posedge clk or posedge rst_n) begin
        if (rst_n) begin
            data_accum <= 0;
        end else begin
            data_accum <= data_accum + data_in;
        end
    end
end

// Data Accumulator module
module data_accumulator(
    input [7:0] data_in,
    output reg [9:0] data_accum
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (data_in) begin
            data_accum <= data_accum + 1;
        end
    end
end

endmodule

// Valid Output module
module valid_output(
    output reg valid_out
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (valid_out) begin
            valid_out <= 1;
        end
        else
            valid_out <= 0;
    end
endmodule

module

// Instantiate the counter
    initial begin
        if (reset) begin
            out = 4'b0000;
        end
    end

    // Increment the counter
    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (!reset) begin
            out = out + 1'b1;
        end
    end

endmodule

module binary_increment (
    input wire clk,
    input wire reset,
    output reg [3:0] out
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (!reset) begin
            out = 3'b0000;
        end
    end

endmodule

// Submodule for absolute value calculation
    absolute_value abs_calc(clk, rst, dividend, divisor, sign, res_ready, res_valid);

    // Submodule for negated value calculation
    abs_value neg_calc(clk, rst, dividend, divisor, sign, res_ready, res_valid);

    // Submodule for division control
    divider_control div_control(clk, rst, res_ready, res_valid);

    // Submodule for result management
    result_management result_management(clk, res_ready, res_valid);

endmodule

module abs_calc(
    input wire clk,
    input wire rst,
    input wire rst,
    input wire res_ready,
    input wire res_valid,
    output reg [7:0] result
);

    always @(posedge clk or posedge rst) begin
        if (rst) begin
            res_ready <= rst;
            res_valid <= 1;
            result <= 0;
        end else if (res_ready) begin
            res_ready <= 0;
            res_valid <= 0;
            result <= 0;
        end else if (res_ready) begin
            res_ready <= 0;
            res_valid <= 0;
            result <= 0;
        end else begin
            res_ready <= 0;
            res_valid <= 0;
            result <= 0;
        end else begin
            res_ready <= 0;
            res_valid <= 0;
            result <= 0;
        end
    end
end

endmodule

module neg_calc(
    input wire clk,
    input wire rst,
    input wire res_ready,
    input wire res_valid,
    output reg res,
    output reg res_ready,
    output reg res_valid
);

    always @(posedge clk or posedge rst) begin
        if (rst) begin
            res_ready <= rst;
            res_valid <= 0;
            res <= 0;
        end else if (res_ready) begin
            res_ready <= 0;
            res_valid <= 0;
            res <= 0;
        end else if (res_ready) begin
            res_ready <= 0;
            res_valid <= 0;
            res <= 0;
        end else begin
            res_ready <= 0;
            res_valid <= 0;
            res <= 0;
        end
    end
end

endmodule

module divider_control(
    input wire clk,
    input wire rst,
    input wire res_ready,
    input wire res_valid,
    output reg res,
    output reg res_ready,
    output reg res_valid
);

    always @(posedge clk or posedge rst) begin
        if (rst) begin
            res_ready <= rst;
            res_valid <= 0;
            res <= 0;
        end else if (res_ready) begin
            res_ready <= 0;
            res_valid <= 0;
            res <= 0;
        end else if (res_ready) begin
            res_ready <= 0;
            res_valid <= 0;
            res <= 0;
        end else begin
            res_ready <= 0;
            res_valid <= 0;
            res <= 0;
        end
    end

endmodule

module abs_value_calculation (
    input wire clk,
    input wire [7:0] dividend,
    input wire [7:0] divisor,
    input wire sign,
    output reg [15:0] result
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (sign) begin
            result = dividend;
        end else begin
            result = (sign) ? (divider + (divider >> 1)) : dividend);
        end
    end

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (sign) begin
            result = dividend;
        end else begin
            result = (sign) ? (divider + (divider >> 1)) : dividend);
        end
    end

endmodule

module JC_register(
    input                clk,
    input                rst_n,
    output    reg [63:0]    Q
);

    always @(*) begin
        if (rst_n) begin
            Q <= 0;
        end else begin
                Q <= 0;
        end
    end
end

module JC_logic(
    input                clk,
    input                rst_n,
    output    reg [63:0]    Q
);

    always @(*) begin
        if (rst_n) begin
            Q <= 0;
        end else begin
            Q <= Q + 1;
        end
    end
end
